songInfo.album:
from Best Of B.B. King Vol. 1 (Flair V2-86230 or 2-91691 (CD) /
Virgin 86230 or 91691 / Capitol 86230) ,

lyrics.l: I got a whole lot o' lovin', baby, just waiting for you
I got a whole lot o' loving, baby, just waitin' for you

And the way I can love you woman, honey, I know you can love me
too
Well, you're so good lookin', baby, and your built up from the ground
Well, you're so good lookin', baby, and your built up from the ground
Ev'ry time I see you baby, my love starts tumblin' down
Yeah, you're just my height baby, just my height and size
Say, you just my type babe, you just my height and size
And the reason I love you, because you got them little dreamy
